ygData.subject: Tarantopulous speaks to Deemos...
ygData.msgSnippet: Tarantopulous didn t respond to Kluster. He wasn t sure if he could be careful, but he was ever confident in his ability to survive. Deemos came up beside

Subject: Tarantopulous speaks to Deemos...
Date: Mon, 22 Jan 2001 19:38:41 -0500
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Priority: 3
X-MSMail-Priority: Normal
X-Mailer: Microsoft Outlook Express 5.00.3018.1300
X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V5.00.3018.1300
From: "SOULSTICE" <thecode@...>

Tarantopulous didn't respond to Kluster. He wasn't sure if he could be
careful, but he was ever confident in his ability to survive. Deemos came up
beside Tarantopulous after he had gotten a good distance away.

Tarantopulous: I will not join the Alliance.

Deemos: Taran, I do not expect you to join the winning faction, but please
do not be too upset when we crush your Maximals.

Tarantopulous: I'm glad you understand. Why did you turn on me like that?
What about the Maximals? You swore your allegiance to them.

Deemos: They never accepted me.

Tarantopulous: How can you say that? You probably never gave them a chance!

The 2 walked together, Clash coming up closer to them in the distance.

Deemos: Well, my destiny lies in a different path than your's.

Tarantopulous: I won't do anything to hamr you, but after we destroy the
Alliance, I fear for your safety, I will try to get them to be merciful on
you.

Deemos: After what I did to the Predacons, I doubt that the Maximals will
beat me.

Tarantopulous: Even if I back them up?

Deemos: Against me, Taran?

Tarantopulous: I see what you mean, but I am a Maximal, and I must help my
comrades.

Deemos: I will not put you down, your beliefs matter to me, but I will not
share them.

Tarantopulous: What?

Deemos: What? What do you mean by what?

Tarantopulous: That.

Deemos looks in the direction Tarantopulous was, and Clash was flying up.
Clash stops in front of them and lands.

Clash: Oh, ho! You want to die, too, huh?

Clash's arm was grown back by now.

Deemos: Apparently you wish to die.

Tarantopulous: Mr, if you try to take me on you will not leave here alive.

Clash: You underestimate me.

Tarantopulous: No, you underestimate me, I am overestimating you.

Deemos: Okay, Taran, this if your fight, not the Alliance's fight, you can
have it.

Deemos steps backwards. Tarantopulous steps forward. Perplex comes walking
up in the distance. Clash looks back and forth between the 2.

Clash: An ambush, eh? Pathetic.

Tarantopulous: I have nothing to do with him, he's probably on your side.

Clash: Enough talking, enguarde!...
